mmud.rest.services

Class PublicBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmud.rest.services.PublicBean

  • public class PublicBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all rest calls that are available to the world, without authentication or authorization. You can find them at /karchangame/resources/public.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Returns the entity manager of Hibernate/JPA. This is defined in build/web/WEB-INF/classes/META-INF/persistence.xml.
        Returns:
        EntityManager

      • fortunes

        public java.util.List<Fortune> fortunes()
        Returns a Fortune 100 of players on karchan. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/fortunes. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • who

        public java.util.List<PublicPerson> who()
        Returns a List of people currently online. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/who. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • news

        public java.util.List<News> news()
        Returns a List of news, recent first. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/news. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • status

        public java.util.List<PublicPerson> status()
        Returns a List of current active and paid up deputies. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/status. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • guilds

        public java.util.List<PublicGuild> guilds()
        Returns a list of Guilds. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/guilds. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • charactersheet

        public PublicPerson charactersheet(java.lang.String name)
        Returns all the info of a character. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/charactersheets/<name>. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.

      • charactersheets

        public java.util.List<PublicPerson> charactersheets()
        Returns a List of characters and their profiles. The URL: /karchangame/resources/public/charactersheets. Can produce both application/xml and application/json.
